entry.title: Web Development Cheat Sheet
entry.content:
在網上收集了一些 Cheat Sheet 是關於開發 Web Application 的，可以幫助你快速查找想要的功能。

Git

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/git-cheat-sheet.png 750 %} from http://zrusin.blogspot.com/2007/09/git-cheat-sheet.html

HTML

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-cheat-sheet-tags.png 750 %} from http://www.inmotionhosting.com/infographics/_img/html5_cheat_sheet_tags.png

HTML5 Web Applications

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-app-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %}

HTML5 Graphics & Embedded Content

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-support-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %}

HTML5 Audio Codecs

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-audio-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %}

HTML5 Video Codecs

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-video-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %}

HTML5 Forms Inputs

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-form-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %}

HTML5 Forms Attributes

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/html5-form-attribute-browser-cheat-sheet.png 750 %} from http://www.findmebyip.com/litmus/

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/html/web-safe-fonts-cheat-sheet.png 750 %} from http://static.omglog.com/uploads/2010/06/web-safe-fonts-cheat-sheet-v1.png

{% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/css/css3-cheat-sheet1.png 750 %} {% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/css/css3-cheat-sheet2.png 750 %} {% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/css/css3-cheat-sheet3.png 750 %} {% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/css/css3-cheat-sheet4.png 750 %} {% img /downloads/code/web-app-development-cheat-sheet/css/css3-cheat-sheet5.png 750 %} from http://media.smashingmagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/images/css3-cheat-sheet/css3-cheat-sheet.pdf
